caption: Two cars , one red and one blue, are parked on a hill, looking out over a distant canyon. Suddenly, a town appears with numerous vehicles. Red and blue cars appear on a road. At the end of the road, many tractors suddenly come into view. The red car follows one of the tractors to an open field. In the desert, the red car discovers another car. The other car suddenly speeds away, drifting through the desert. The red car follows it. The red car follows the other car and returns to the warehouse in the town, and they looked at a the newspaper on the wall.

global.question: Do more than 5 people appear in the video?
What kind of objects are the characters in the clip?
When does it happen in the video, ancient age, modern age or future?
Does it happen during day or night?
